A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you consider yourself a fan of the simple but powerful story telling of the original films.  The Last Jedi isn't for you.  If you enjoyed the narrative\, originality\, and world building of the prequels. Then The Last Jedi isn't for you.  If you value a tight script.  Then The Last Jedi isn't for you.  If you enjoy suspense and gripping action. Then The Last Jedi isn't for you.  In fact the only audience I can recommend The Last Jedi to are those critical reviewers who are simply looking for low hanging fruit.
